results.content: Volkan is a superb web-architect and I have enjoyed all his courses.  Once you become used to Volkans accent (of course we all have our own accent) then you quickly realise Volkan really knows and understands the technology he is teaching.  This particular course is a beast! 68 hours of web dev. that is straight into the action and in terms of leaning everything there is about C# and how it interoperates Volkan show's us the fundamentals and starts from scratch.  The breadth of course in the beginning shows how we connect databases via Microsoft Studio and Visual Studio and how this is done in code.  I've not completed 1% of this course and I am already learning things I didn't know before so you can understand how much detail there is available to learn here.  If you need a course to begin with before this course then you can take Volkan's Django course that is not as rigorous as this but just as valuable.  5***** and a course that is as good if not better than the courses taught by the Microsoft Engineers themselves.
